text: el.ti.ti.ee. sakakaruwanta erehiwa lingika pa්rachandathwaya yoda ganima, balahathkari athurudahanwim sidu kirima, wadhahinsa athulu kuriru amanushika, awaman sahagatha salakili dakwim, samanya janathawata bara awi pa්rahara ella kota ghathanaya kota thibima, gatumata lakwa siti pa්radeshawala janathawata manushiya aadhara labadima awahira kirima aadiya ee athara wenawa.
motar rathaya niwasehi gatena wita niwasa thula pudgalayan thideneku siti namuth owun kisiwekutath haniyak sidu nowiya.
ee ekkama ape sangitha guruwaru wechcha ashoka pushpakumara guruthumayi, layanal bandara guruthumagenuyi labune puduma sahayogayak.
hruda spandanaya pawa nawathi athi seyaki.

mehi prathipalayak lesa “thani tharu” bihiwima aarambha wu athara atham kridakayan sandaha ratata pera mudal issara wana bawata chodana ella wima da nirantharayen sidu wiya. 20/20 tharu pelaharin krikat wanijakaranaya wimen pasu kridakayan ha owunge wilasitha anugamanaya karana prekshaka sanskruthiyak bihiwana ladi.
siyalu prantha aandu wisuruwa saha nawum wattuwe prathikara sandaha yanna bawa
(pawar, dinu, rata wenuwen hithanneth ehema neda?)

uthuru pradeshaye wishala washayen idam nidahas kirimata tharam anawashya kandawuru nomathi bawath idam nidahas kirime kramawedaya sambandhayen thamage pahadimak nomathi bawada amathyawaraya prakasha kaleya.
ee wagema loku walawal.
dhanawathunta wada duppathun,hingannan sundara hadawath athi shishta hadiyawa athi aya yayi sithana lankiya durmathaya mama bahara karami.
eks jala paddhathiye sankalpaya silla wadasatahana samaga anurekhanaya kala haka.
jayen jayama wewi.thawa thawath idiriyatama yanna apen subha pathum……saho.jaya wewa.
athgale padanchiwa siti reji, kolambaa pamini wita nathara wuye apa niwaseya.
praharaye pradhana sakakaru menma anekuth praharakayan siyaluma dena muslimwarun ya.
owunta eya chatisgarhi pawathwannata sidu wiya.
anapekshitha lesa sidukala me parikshawa nisa the kamhal wikshiptha wuna.
machan matath dawasaka oya gamana yanna oone habayi thaniyama ...
eeta passe aapahu wada wadi pidanaya.
ema rathu warenthuwata anuwa juliyan asenj hata naga athi chodanawa, “lingika wadahinsa paminawima” yi..
ema surathal pemwathun siyalu dena dawi…
"kalinuth awith indala mama pihidala damma...
ayi dakke nathida..?
ashenge upandinaya da siduwima kalana nawathath sihipath kalaya..
samaharun dosharopanaya kala.
apa batahira widyagnyayan kiyana de piliganne ee siyalla pilibanda paryeshana kara balimen pasuwa no we.
sthuthiyi machan !
aadarayayi, wairayayi athare thiyenneth kes gahaka paratharayaklu.
chudithaya wedi thabanne polis niladharayage gini awiyen ya.
methanata genna epa..."
me karuna amathaka karanna epa.
eeka janathawa saha janadhipathithuma thiranaya karanna oona.
thibunath wadiya na..
wochar hat eken kiwwa athule mis kenek athi ofis ekata athul wena thanama wam paththe, eyawa hamba wenta kiyala, ...ee mis thamayi nishanthi.
“katada me..?” “oyata..”
namuth me paramparawala rawi jayawardhana wani deshapremin da sitiya.
ahala pahala kattiya wata wela majik wage balagena innawa.

shalyagarawala aluthwadiya katayuthu hethuwen me wanawita kolambaa jathika rohale hadawath sathkam nokerena athara ehi hadawath sathkam kala yuthu rogin jayawardhanapura rohalata marukara yawuwath eya pa්ramanawath nowana nisa mema piyawara gath bawa sama kabinat pa්rakashaka idam ha parlimenthu amathi gayantha karunathilaka mahatha pawasiya.

hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage karyalaye ihala niladhariyeku wisin amarikanu janadhipathiwarayage ihala niladhariyeku sambandha kara gena athi athara ohu wisin pawasa aththe kisi witakath hitapu janadhipathiwarayekuta ewani sanwadayak sadaha awasthawak laba dimata nohaki bawayi.

ada pawathwana wesak uthsawa desa balana wita eya yatathwijitha nirmanayak lesa no pene.

eewa bohomayak riyadura athuluwa dennekuta witharak yanna puluwan, podi motar sayikal enjin thibunu, samahara welawata riwas giyar ekak pawa nothibunu kar (riwas ekak nathnam ee kale motar sayikal layisan eken mewa elawanna awasara thibunalu).

nam habayi kiyanda tharam wishesha deyak penune naha.monawa karannada mama aawa enda..
ethekota karanna thiyanne kathikaya kathakarana peliyen peliya pariwarthakaya wisin awasha anek bhashawata pariwarthanaya kirimayi.
ee jiwithaya mal tharam sonduru nowana bawini.
uthure samanya jana jiwithayata hamudawe madihathwima, eeta wiruddhawa jeppo hum kiyanna..
nawathath kiyanna thiyenne ara hitha amanapa karaganna kallata man aayemath kamathi naha kiyala awadharanayen kiyanna oona...

andiya kament kiyewwoth hari.

me aya athara wadimahalla jothipalayan miya yana wita da awurudu singith theki.thawa ilandariyek jothipala athulu kalakaruwan rasak samipawa asuru kala pawulaka samajikayeki.eheth ohu da jiwath wu jothi daka thibune natha.owunge wirayan ho paramadarshi charitha bawata pathwa aththe ma ho mage samakalinayange wirayo nowethi.ma wishwasa karanne kalin paramparawalata wada attakuna nowu emenma lokaye wada nirmanashili wana me gatawarayan apata wada hondin aluth nirmana rasa windina bawaki .owunge ho ape kalawe manayan indurama wenasya.apata wada owun kalawa sambandhawa awankaya.eheth yawathkalina wannata kamathi mata me asura manaramya.owun samaga mathawadi gatum thibuna da ma aluth yamak dana ganne owun ge asura samagaya.lokaye boho nirmana pilibanda katha bahe yeduna apage mathrukawakata ech.aar.jothipalayan yomuwune ahambayak hatiyataya."mara filin woyis ekak " ekek kiya sitiyeya."ehema woyis ekak thawamath apata naha."anekeku da kiya sitiyeya.dirgha katha bahak saransha gatha kara gaththoth elesaya.me pirisa jothipalayan gi gayu chithrapata narambauwo nowethi.owun jothi ge handa osse gi walata ranga pa naluwan bahutharayakage chithrapata daka natha.emenma ese ranga pa boho naluwan owunata wirayan da nowethi.

merata sisu daruwanta hoda adhyapanayak uruma kara dima sandaha basnahira palathe prathamika pasal pansiya this pahak(535) janapriya pasal mattamata sanwardhanaya karime dawantha wadapiliwelak arambau bawa basnahira palath pradhana amathi prasanna ranathunga mahatha prakasha keleya.me prathamika pasal 535 "lama mithurupasal"lesa sanwardhanaya kerena bawath danatamath pasal 161k sanwardhanaya sandaha prathipadana labi athi bawath maha amathiwaraya anawaranaya keleya.pasal dahasak nagasitu wime jathika wadapiliwela yatathe basnahira palath pasal 134k sanwardhanaya kala bawa ki hethema pasal 12ka mahindodaya thakshana widyagara idikala bawa sandahan keleya.pasugiya kalasimawedi basnahira palath adhyapanaya wenuwen palath ayawaya wadima mudal pramanaya wen kele palath adhyapanaya naga situ wimata bawa awadharanaya kala maha amathiwaraya rupiyal miliyana 1267ka wiyadamin panthikamara1712 me palath pasalwala idi kara athayi pawasiya.esema palathe pasal 4800k warnalepa kirima palath adhyapana amathyanshaya aadhara yatathe sidu kala bawa ki ee mahatha ee wenuwen miliyana 372k warshikawa waya karana bawa kiya.pasal wala bhauthika sampath naga situwimen nonawathuna palath sabhawa guru purappadu sapuramin upadhidharin 10,000kgurawarun lesa bandawa ganimatada piyawara gath bawa wadiduratath pawasiya.
